scripts.deploy-a: react-scripts build && aws s3 cp build/ s3://mukaoapp-a/ --recursive --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers
scripts.deploy-b: react-scripts build && aws s3 cp build/ s3://mukaoapp-b/ --recursive --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers
